event_text: Your agent’s luck has run out. In the shadows of [district], they were cornered by an enemy patrol. [agent] fought valiantly, but overwhelming numbers led to their capture. The enemy now holds them in custody, and it is only a matter of time before they begin interrogations.

Dark news from [district]. [agent] was intercepted during a mission and tragically killed in the line of duty. Despite their skill and bravery, the enemy's presence proved overwhelming, leaving no chance for escape.
